name: German Shepherd
description: The German Shepherd is a highly intelligent and versatile dog breed known for its strength, loyalty, and agility. Originally bred for herding.

name: Dalmation
description: Dalmatians are distinctive dogs known for their unique black or liver spotted coat. Dalmatians are often associated with firehouses .

name: Bulldog
description: Bulldogs are known for their distinctive wrinkled face and muscular build. Despite their tough appearance, they are gentle, friendly.

name: Labrador Retriever
description: Labrador Retrievers are known for their friendly and outgoing nature. They are intelligent, versatile, and often used as guide dogs and in search and rescue operations.

name: Siberian Husky
description: Siberian Huskies are known for their striking appearance and thick double coat. They are energetic, intelligent, and were originally bred as sled dogs. Huskies are social and friendly.

name: Golden Retriever
description: Golden Retrievers are known for their friendly and gentle temperament. They are highly intelligent and often used as therapy dogs. They have a dense, water-repellent coat.
